name: A World Abandoned - Spring Cleaning Jam Version

description:
Follow the development  Join the discord:

If you want to see regular updates on the game , influence the development or just to chat with me you are welcome to join the discord.

  https://discord.gg/Xwkghfr Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1512810/A_World_Abandoned/ What is AWA ?

A World Abandoned is a metroidvania / recursive sprawler with a focus on exploration and character progression / build diversity. You play as an android named emanda 607 and are sent to an abandoned planet that is torn in half. Your mission is to find the last living human. But things aren't how they seem at first and maybe you will find out who and where you really are.

The project started with a game jam game that you can check out here:

https://michael-grieshofer.itch.io/abandoned

Spring Cleaning Jam Info

This game has been in development since august 2020, so please keep that in mind

this version of the game includes just a small starting area but you can access all the content that is in the game if you input the Konami code in the main menu: up , up, down, down , left, right, left, right, B, A, (works on keyboard and controller) BUT BE WARNED OF SPOILERS FOR THE FULL GAME 

stuff I want to accomplish during the jam:

- Combo system

- Combo abilities

- at least one more enemy

- more if there is enough time
